name: Tourist places
detail: A captivating mosaic of scenic vistas and adventurous experiences, inviting exploration.

name: Architecture
detail: Distinctive architectural styles blending indigenous traditions with external influences.

name: Historical sites
detail: Ancient remnants that chronicle the region's fascinating past and offer glimpses into the historical tapestry.

name: History
detail: A tapestry of ancient civilizations, tribal cultures, colonial encounters and post-independence developments.

name: Music
detail: An enchanting fusion of traditional melodies, rhythmic beats, and vibrant folk traditions.

name: Dance
detail: Energetic and expressive dance forms showcasing cultural diversity and storytelling traditions.

name: Art & Craft
detail: Vibrant and intricate art forms, handcrafted with skill and precision, representing the rich artistic heritage.

name: Literature
detail: A diverse and compelling literary tradition that weaves together myths, folktales and contemporary narratives.

name: Cuisines
detail: A tantalizing array of flavors and aromatic delicacies, rooted in local ingredients and culinary traditions.

name: Festivals
detail: Colorful celebrations filled with traditional rituals, vibrant costumes and spirited performances, showcasing the cultural vibrancy.
